差一點兒.definition: erhua variant of 差一點|差一点[cha4 yi1 dian3]

差不多.definition: almost; nearly; more or less; about the same; good enough; not bad

差不離.definition: not much different; similar; ordinary; nearly

差不離兒.definition: erhua variant of 差不離|差不离[cha4 bu4 li2]

差之毫釐，失之千里.pinyin: cha1 zhi1 hao2 li2 , shi1 zhi1 qian1 li3
差之毫釐，失之千里.definition: the slightest difference leads to a huge loss (idiom); a miss is as good as a mile

差之毫釐，謬以千里.pinyin: cha1 zhi1 hao2 li2 , miu4 yi3 qian1 li3
差之毫釐，謬以千里.definition: the slightest difference leads to a huge error (idiom); a miss is as good as a mile

差事.definition: errand; assignment; job; commission; CL:件[jian4]; see also 差使[chai1 shi5]

差使.definition: official post; billet; commission; CL:件[jian4]; see also 差事[chai1 shi5]

差勁.definition: bad; no good; below average; disappointing

差商.definition: (math.) difference quotient; (math.) divided difference; (math.) finite difference

差役.definition: forced labor of feudal tenant (corvée); bailiff of feudal yamen

差得多.definition: to fall well short (in terms of quality, quantity or degree)

差旅.definition: to travel on business; to go on a business trip

差生文具多.definition: (neologism c. 2021) underachieving students tend to buy lots of stationery; (fig.) all the gear and no idea

差異化.definition: differentiation (of a product from its competitors etc)

差遠.definition: inferior; not up to par; to fall far short; to be mistaken

差錯.definition: mistake; slip-up; fault; error; accident; mishap

差額.definition: balance (financial); discrepancy (in a sum or quota); difference

差額選舉.definition: competitive election (i.e. with more candidates than seats)

差點兒.definition: erhua variant of 差點|差点[cha4 dian3]

差點沒.definition: almost; nearly; (i.e. same as 差點|差点[cha4 dian3])
